comments.creator: paul@mozilla.com
comments.author: paul@mozilla.com
comments.text:
So we want so kind of "assistant", like this: http://dribbble.com/LeaVerou/tags/mystery

Maybe read-only, maybe not. I am not sure it has to be a tooltip. It can have a different form. Maybe less invasive, maybe bigger. We would probably need something generic enough to be used with the Rule and Property view.

I think this should be conceptualized and designed by someone from UX.
